title: Hakuba Snowboarding 3! Iwatake
content:
Wednesday we went to a new mountain for boarding and skiiing! Iwatake was a short shuttle bus ride from our villa and proved to be a great place to spend the day! Not as big as Happo-one, but it was a lot of fun! A main gondola goes to the top of the mountain, then there are runs on every side of the mountain going in all directions! It gives a fantastic view of the valley around the town, including the other ski resort areas (you could see the lifts on the other close mountains!). The terrain is all wide and enjoyable to ride, and we even managed an accessible spot of powder - this stuff was hard to ride in because of how different it is, but we had fun getting stuck up to our knees and falling completely in to it!

Tomorrow is our last day in Hakuba and last day snowboarding - Hakuba 47 and Goryu mountains (linked) are our target!
